system.description: The Pokemon covers the foe in cotton, disrupting its movement speed.
system.effect: Reduce foe's Dexterity by 2.

system.description: The user sings and dances to a melody so beautiful you won't notice you were crying while listening to it.
system.effect: Sound Based. Roll 1 Die to put the foe to Sleep. If successful, the User may choose to change its form afterwards.

system.description: The Pokemon puts its last strength into an all-or-nothing attack. After that, it faints.
system.effect: Ignore the foe's Defenses. The user faints after dealing damage.

system.description: The user slides on the floor as if it was ice-skating, only there is no ice, only a raging fire.
system.effect: If the user of this Move is at its Final Stage of Evolution, this move fails. Burn the Foe.

system.description: The Pokemon has a perfectly good drum and you'd think it would use it. But it doesn't. It uses it's foe.
system.effect: Reduce the Foe's Dexterity

system.description: The user sprays ink at the target's face to obstruct its vison.
system.effect: Roll 5 Chance Dice to Reduce the foe's Accuracy. -2 Accuracy.

system.description: The Pokemon makes a judo maneuver, using its body mass instead of its strength against the target.
The Pokemon will raise the temperature along with the sun, it doesn't work at night, indoors, underground, or underwater.
system.effect: Sunny Weather is activated for the next 4 Rounds.

system.description: A swarm of bugs flies around the user, creating a barrier to protect this Pokemon from damage.
system.effect: User Increases its Defense and Sp. Defense.

system.description: The Pokemon grips the foe and starts crushing it. Small targets are difficult to grasp but larger bodies will not be released until they break.
system.effect: Lethal. If the foe has a Base HP higher than 3, add 1 Die to the Damage pool for every exceeding point. Up to 9 Dice may be added this way

system.description: The user quickly throws blows of open-palmed thrusts against the foe.
system.effect: Successive Actions.

system.description: The Pokemon stabs its foe with a sting or tentacle drenched with venom.
system.effect: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Poison the Foe.

system.description: The Pokemon uses its powerful gelid arms and strikes the foe with a swinging motion.
system.effect: Reduce User's Dexterity. -1 Accuracy.

system.description: The Pokemon recites an enchantment and blows a cloud of pink dust on its Target. Afterwards, the target becomes especially good at guessing which card you got from a deck.
system.effect: Change the target's Type to Psychic.

system.description: The user fills its mouth with dirt and spits a torrent of mud at the foes. This mud may get in the eyes of the enemies.
system.effect: All Foes in Range. Roll 3 Chance Dice to Reduce the Accuracy of those affected. -2 Accuracy.

system.description: The earth moves on its own, no attacker in sight. The floor crumbles and the ground shakes while engulfing its victims. From the rubble, lush trees emerge a short time after.
system.effect: Lethal. Ranged. All Foes in Range.

system.description: The user canalizes the damage received by energies and bounces them back to their source.
system.effect: The move only works if the foe just used a Special Attack. Roll the same Damage Pool as your foe's last attack and add 2 Extra Damage Dice. Ignore the foe's Defenses.

system.description: The user cuts down the rough edges of its body to make it as sharp as a razor.
system.effect: Increase the User's Strength.

system.description: The Pokemon steps and stomps the foe, the weight may leave the target squashed on the floor.
system.effect: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Flinch the foe.

system.description: The Pokemon uses the classic 'One-Two' to attack the foe.
system.effect: Double Action. -1 Accuracy.

system.description: The Pokemon will make an incredible jump to the sky, then lunge towards the foe at a staggering speed, crashing the ground upon impact. The user is left very tired.
system.effect: Lethal. Must Recharge. -1 Accuracy.

system.description: The Pokemon emits a series of ultrasonic waves that make the foe dizzy and disoriented.
system.effect: Confuse the foe. -3 Accuracy.

system.description: The Pokemon bites hard into the foe with its powerful fangs.
system.effect: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Flinch.

system.description: The user shoots up bits of molten lava that fall scattered around the field.
system.effect: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Burn those affected.

system.description: The user attacks with a ray of light that comes out of the gem on its body.
The user covers everything with mud, reducing the effectiveness of electric attacks made on the field.
system.effect: For the next 4 Rounds Electric Type attacks won't add their Power to the Damage Pool.

system.description: The user lets out an infectious yawn that will make anyone drowsy enough to fall asleep pretty soon.
system.effect: If the target is not removed from battle by the start of its next Round, it will fall asleep.

system.description: The user builds up a lot of snow around itself. If anything disturbs the snow, it will fall on the attacker like an avalanche.
system.effect: Low Priority 4. If the user received damage from the target this Round, Add 2 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool.

system.description: The user quickly releases jolts of electricity that are too fast for many to react.
system.effect: Never Fail.

system.description: The user charges against the foe using its body to knock it down, leaving the target stunned.
system.effect: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Paralyze the foe.

system.description: The user will closely watch the movements of the target and will imitate them to perfection.
system.effect: Copies the last move the foe has performed.

system.description: The Pokemon gets close to its foe then strikes while bursting a full-force blast of pressurized water, the water may cut or dent through the foe's armor.
system.effect: Lethal. Roll 2 Chance Dice to Reduce the Foe's Defense.

system.description: The Pokemon releases a big cloud of toxic gas, anyone who takes a breath will start coughing violently. They should seek a doctor immediately.
system.effect: Poison those affected. -1 Accuracy.

system.description: The user awakens their primal instinct as a dragon and unleashes its uncontrollable fury, destroying everything in its path. After that, the Pokemon is left disoriented and confused.
system.effect: Rampage.

system.description: The user coats itself in a ring of special flowing water that lessens the pain.
system.effect: If successful spent 1 Will point to activate. At the end of each Round, recover 1 HP. Lasts 4 Rounds.

system.description: User flaps its wings and casts a turbulent wind that helps the team move significantly faster.
system.effect: For the Next 4 Rounds, Increase the Dexterity of the User and All Allies in the field by 2.

system.description: The Pokemon releases medicinal scents and vapors to refresh the user and its allies.
system.effect: Cure User and Allies from Burn, Freeze, Paralysis, Poison, or Sleep.

system.description: The Pokemon viciously snarls showing its teeth. Its menacing look will make the foe cower in fear.
system.effect: Sound Based. Reduce the foe's Special.

system.description: The Pokemon will make an upfront attack. If the user is suffering, the attack will be stronger.
system.effect: If User's got a Status Ailment (Paralysis, Poison, Burn, etc.) Add 3 Extra Dice to the Damage pool.

system.description: Solid ground becomes a sandtrap, cracked earth will close to ensnare your feet. It's as it the land itself wanted to trap you. There is no attacker nor escape in sight.
system.effect: Blocks. Ranged. All Foes in Range.

system.description: The user flies towards the foe and strikes with its wings.
The user sends out a haze that disturbs all the Pokemon engaged in battle. It may conceal whoever is inside.
system.effect: Remove all Increased or Reduced Attributes and Traits on everyone on the Battlefield.

system.description: The user moves swiftly, blocking the escape routes of the foe.
system.effect: Blocks.

system.description: A concentrated ray of light that is capable of melting even the thickest steel plates. Unfortunately the user will also have trouble handling this power.
system.effect: Recoil.

system.description: The user chants an incantation to the skies. The beautiful performance grants this Pokemon and its allies divine protection.
system.effect: User and Allies in range can re-roll one un-successful die from all their rolls until the end of the scene. If an opponent would land a Critical Hit it doesn't. Outside of battle good things happen at the story tellers discretion.

system.description: The Pokemon swings its body as a hammer and leaves the foe nailed to the cracked ground.
The user traps and crushes the opponent using its thick and sturdy shell.
system.effect: Block. Deal 2 Dice of Damage at the end of each Round. Lasts 4 Rounds. -1 Accuracy.

system.description: The user shows its cute demeanor, making the foe unsure about attacking the user with full force.
system.effect: Reduce the foe's Strength. Sound Based. Same move as "Growl (Tough)", the user should use the one with highest stat (tough / cute)

system.description: The user wraps its tentacles to immobilize the foe. Being so close enables the user to find weak spots.
system.effect: Block. Reduce the foe's Defense and Sp. Defense.

system.description: Employ a hypnotic suggestion to make the target feel drowsy and fall into a deep slumber. Works better on a target that is not in danger.
system.effect: Put the target to sleep. Dark-Type Pokemon are affected by this move. -4 Accuracy.

system.description: The user attacks its foe with two or more slaps in the face.
system.effect: Successive Actions. -2 Accuracy.

system.description: The user tackles the foe, releasing a powerful spark on contact.
system.effect: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Paralyze the foe.

system.description: The user opens its mouth and sends a powerful wave of energy.

system.effect: Increase the user's Special by 2.

system.description: The user will send out a wave of sharp wind that will harm anything it touches.
system.effect: Target all foes in Range. High Critical.

system.description: The Pokemon charges at the foe with a brutal headbutt that may leave the target knocked down on the ground.
system.effect: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Flinch the Foe.

system.description: The user mimics the environment, it becomes one with the surroundings.
system.effect: For the rest of the scene the User changes type to one that fits the terrain it is in (i.e. Usar is in a rocky cave, becoming rock type)

system.description: The user throws leaf darts towards its foe.
system.effect: Ranged.

system.description: The user sets itself on fire, recklessly charging against the target with a brutal strike.
system.effect: Recoil. Roll 1 Chance Dice to Apply Burn 3 to the foe.

system.description: The Pokemon strikes its foe and takes the opportunity to steal whatever the target was holding.
system.effect: The user steals the foe's Held Item.

system.description: The Pokemon showers its foe with stings or spikes that pierce like needles.

system.description: A large pincer strikes with the power of a hammer. The demolition power is incredible.

system.description: The Pokemon gives a menacing look that freezes the foe on the spot with intense fear.

system.description: The user flies towards the foe from the sky in pure Lucha Libre style.

system.description: Through sheer psychic power, the user materializes its energy to deal a heavy strike to its foe.

system.description: The user traps the foe between its gears and crushes it with two painful grinds.

system.effect: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Reduce the foe's Sp. Defense.

system.description: The Pokemon makes use of the terrain and asks the nature for aid in battle.

system.effect: High Critical. Ignore effects from Moves or Abilities that would prevent this Move from targeting a foe.

This move represents every possible move. Metronome but better.

system.description: The user makes use of its good looks and attitude to infatuate its foe.
system.effect: If Successful, Target is now In Love. This Move fails if target is from same gender as the User or genderless.

system.effect: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Reduce the foe's Defense. -3 Accuracy.

system.effect: Lethal. If anything on the foe's side of the field would prevent this move from dealing damage (Pokemon types. Abilities. Shield Moves. Weather. Or Barriers.) ignore it. This Move cannot be Clashed.

system.effect: Lethal. After Damage is dealt, the user is no longer considered a Fire-Type for the rest of the day (if its only type was Fire, it is now considered Typeless). Fire-type Moves won't add their Power to the Damage pool of this Pokemon for the rest of the day.

system.description: The user attacks with an uppercut, throwing the foe skyward with lots of force.
system.effect: -1 Accuracy.

system.effect: Deal 2 Damage to the user and put a decoy with 2 HP with the same Defenses as the user. If the decoy's HP is depleted, it disappears and the user comes back into the fight. Decoy can only be affected by damaging moves.

system.description: The user strikes the foe with its hard head. Perfect for taking down fruits from trees or shake Pokemon out of their nests on treetops.
system.effect: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Flinch. May call Random Encounters when hitting trees.

system.description: The user gets prepared to receive a fatal blow. It resists the pain despite being seriously hurt.

system.description: The Pokemon waves its hands with rhythm. The energy around follows the cadence and manifests with an impressive attack.

system.description: The Pokemon drenches poison into its pincers to slash the enemy in a brutal way.

system.effect: For the next 4 Rounds, all Psychic Attacks will deal 1 Extra Dice of Damage. No Pokemon on the ground can use moves with increased Priority.

system.description: A song of mourning and despair that resonates on the minds of anyone who listens. Makes you feel like you are on your death bed.
system.effect: After three rounds, if any Pokemon who heard the song is not removed from battle, it will receive its remaining HP as damage. Sound Based.

system.description: The user stops battling and feigns to be crying, disrupting the foe's mood to battle and making it lower its guard.
system.effect: Reduce the foe's Sp. Defense by 2.

system.description: The user vibrates with any particular energy Type he chooses. All nearby creatures and objects of that Type are hurt.
system.effect: Sound Based. Choose a Type (Fire, Poison, Steel, etc.) this move only affects those with that Type.

system.description: The Pokemon gathers nature's energy in a ball and hurls it at the foe. Trees and bushes may be left opaque and sad.
system.effect: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Reduce foe's Sp. Defense.

system.description: The user electrifies the terrain, making it impossible to get a good night's sleep on it.
system.effect: For the Next 4 Rounds all Electric Attacks will deal 1 Extra Dice of Damage. Anyone on the ground will be cured from "Sleep" Status.

system.description: The user quietly calms its spirit to strengthen its mind and body.
system.effect: Increase the User's Special and Sp. Defense.

system.description: The user launches itself against the foe to strike it with an iron fist.
system.effect: Fist Based. Priority 1.

system.description: With a disgusting diet and training, the user learns how to turn its fluids into a deadly toxin.
system.effect: Badly Poison the Foe. -1 Accuracy.

system.description: The user shoots a gelid breath against the target that sends a chill through the spine. The sudden change of temperature can bring anyone to its knees.
system.effect: This Move is always a Critical Hit and it gets the proper bonus for it. -1 Accuracy.

system.effect: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Confuse the foe.

system.effect: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Reduce the Foe's Accuracy. -2 Accuracy.

system.description: The moon shines at the darkest hours, reflecting the sun's lifebringer light on those who fell into the night, taking pity on their lost souls.
system.effect: The user Faints. One fallen Ally regains consciousness, has its HP fully restored and all Status Ailments healed. If the Ally was not in-battle, it is called out and ready to fight.

system.description: The Pokemon stabs the foe with its stinger, claws or spikes infused with poison.
system.effect: Double action. Ranged. Roll 2 Chance Dice to Poison the foe per hit.

system.description: The Pokemon punches through its own shadow. The attack comes out from the foe's shadows as if it were a portal.
system.effect: Fist Based. Never Fail.

The User runs away from the battlefield. This effect ends the battle. Foes might try to prevent this by rolling: Dexterity + Athletic and scoring the same or more successes. If the user is Blocked this Maneuver fails.

system.description: A weird-looking Pokemon charged against its foes, the same attack releases different kinds of energy depending on the disk it was holding.
system.effect: This Move's type will always match the User's first Type.

system.description: The user shoots a torrent of boiling water, it may leave the foe sopping with burns.
system.effect: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Burn the foe.

system.description: In a reckless action, the user charges against the foe to stop its momentum and block its incoming attack. Being so close allows the user to reach for weak spots.
system.effect: Priority 4. Shield Move. * If the Foe used a Non-Ranged Physical Move against the user, Reduce the Foes Defense by 2. Reduce 3 Dice from the foe's Damage Pool.

system.description: With a flicker of its claws, Palkia defragments the space around its foe. Those who survive rarely do peserve their original shape.

system.description: If the Pokemon is treated with care and love, it will return that affection by giving all it's got in battle.
system.effect: Add 1 Dice to the Damage Roll for every point of Happiness on the User.

system.description: The Pokemon digs around and moves the soil to make it ideal for plant growth.
system.effect: Increase the Strength and Special of all Grass Type Pokemon in the battlefield.

system.description: The user produces a horrible noise that impedes the foe from focusing on the fight, leaving it vulnerable to attacks.

system.description: The Pokemon moves towards the foe and plants a delicate kiss on its cheek, then leaves playfully. The foe struggles to know what it meant.

system.description: The user lets out a mystical green breath that hinders the movement of anyone it touches.

system.description: The Pokemon unleashes a swirling and glittery energy that releases a pleasant aroma that soothes the body and has healing properties.

system.description: The Pokemon shoots one or more sharp leaves that cut through all targets as if they were razors.

system.description: The Pokemon Throws many round objects at the target, one after the other.

system.description: A breeze so cold that it chills you to the bone, making it harder to move.
system.effect: Reduce Dexterity of those affected.

system.description: The Pokemon happily runs into a wheel made of electricity that strikes the foe. If the user is feeling hungry the wheel's energy is replaced by a dark aura.

system.effect: Add 1 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool for every 50 kgs. of weight on the foe, up to +4 Extra Dice.

system.description: They Pokemon uses its slender vines as a whip against the foe. They are as long as 20 feet.
The user crushes its claws against the foe, it may pierce the skin of the foe.
system.effect: Roll 5 Chance Dice to Reduce the target's Defense by 2. Lethal.

system.description: The user sneaks through darkness and strikes out of the target's shadow. The Pokemon can move freely inside shades as if it were incorporeal.

system.description: With pure willpower, the user struggles with its foe despite the pain

system.description: The Pokemon recklessly grapples the foe to smash it on the ground.

system.description: The Pokemon assists an ally. Together they are stronger.
system.effect: Target Pokemon gets 2 Extra Dice on its next Skill, Accuracy and Damage Rolls. Priority 5.

system.description: It apparently just buries underground, but secretely the Pokemon prepares its shell to detonate; anyone who steps on it will be blown to pieces.
system.effect: Low Priority 3. This Move strikes the next time the user is hit with a Non-Ranged Physical attack.

system.description: This move controls the emotions of the target, making it feel loved and safe. The user may strike immediately.
system.effect: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Flinch the foe.

system.description: The Pokemon lets out an impressive howl, making it appear a lot more menacing.
system.effect: Increase the User's Strength.

system.description: The user retaliates against the foe, the rush of adrenaline allows it to hit harder.
system.effect: If the User has already received damage from the target this Round add 2 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool.

system.description: The user delivers a chop with its arms crossed trying to hot a weak spot.
system.effect: High Critical. -2 Accuracy.

system.description: Through a prism, the user shoots a concentrated laser beam that pierces everything that comes in contact with it. The effort leaves the user mentally exhausted.
system.effect: Lethal. Must Recharge.

system.description: With the help of some air balloons, the user jumps up high and falls on top of its foe. The use of balloons in-battle is questionable, but the referee will allow them.
system.effect: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Flinch the Foe. If the user of this Move is at its Final Stage of Evolution, this move fails.

system.description: The Pokemon shows off its attractiveness and even flirts with the opponents, those who fall for its charms can’t focus on the battle.
system.effect: If the affected targets are from the opposite gender, Reduce their Special by 2.

system.description: The user swings both of its arms against the target, there's no armor thick enough to stop the strike.
system.effect: Ignore the the foe's Attribute Increases that would decrease this Move's damage.

system.description: The Pokemon jumps at the foe to crush it with an awful bite.
system.effect: Damage Roll is Half of the Foe's remaining HP (up to 10) rounded down. If the remaining HP of the foe is 1 this move fails. Ignore the foe's Defenses. -1 Accuracy.

system.description: The user quickly freezes some bits of ice and throws them at the target.
system.effect: Ranged. Priority 1.

system.description: A light beam pierces the battlefield, it deals devastating damage but leaves newly grown flowers instead of scorched earth. The user is left feeling very tired.
system.effect: Lethal. Reduce User's Special by 2. -1 Accuracy.

system.description: The user forces everyone's wounds to stay open by using its immense psychic power.
system.effect: No one can regain any lost HP. Lasts 4 Rounds.

system.description: An invisible wave cuts through the target, you can feel its sharp edge but you cannot see it.
system.effect: Apply the foe's Defense instead of its Sp. Defense to resist Damage from this Move

system.description: The Pokemon shoots a fiery eruption to its foe. Unable to escape and surrounded by the unbearable heat the foe's survival is at risk.
system.effect: Blocks. Roll 3 Damage Dice at the end of each Round. Lasts 4 Rounds. -2 Accuracy.

system.description: The Pokemon sharpens its claws to perform more precise attacks.
system.effect: Increase the User's Strength and Accuracy.

system.description: The Pokemon makes a dance that raises its battle spirit.
system.effect: Increase the User's Strength by 2.

system.description: After receiving damage, the user bursts the tiny but sharp metal piece that came loose because of the foe's attack. The greater the impact the more metal it will shoot.
system.effect: This Move only works if the foe just used an attack. Roll the same Damage Pool as your foe's last attack and add 2 Extra Damage Dice.

system.description: The user quickly slashes through the target as soon as it gets the chance. The intent to end the target's life is frightening.
system.effect: Lethal. High Critical.

system.description: The user eats the dreams of a sleeping target. When the foe wakes up, it will feel weak and empty.
system.effect: The user restores HP equal to half the damage dealt, rounded down. The target must be asleep, this move will fail otherwise.

system.description: The Pokemon awaits for the perfect moment to strike the foe.
system.effect: Low Priority 1. Never Fail.

system.description: The Pokemon employs its psychic power to make the opponent feel like it's got your weaknesses and make the user feel like it's got the target's strength.
system.effect: Switch your Strength and Special with your foe.

system.description: The Pokemon releases an aroma that its enemies will love.
system.effect: Those affected cannot evade moves performed by the user. Attracts wild Pokemon if used outside of battle.

system.description: The Pokemon sends a small psychic wave to its target, giving it a simpler point of view about the world.
system.effect: Target Pokemon ability is now "Simple".

system.description: The Pokemon disappears into a dark dimension to strike its foe at the next opportunity. The blow will hurt the target not on their body but directly on their soul.
system.effect: Lethal. Charge Move. While charging this Move, other Move will not affect the user. If the Target made a Shielding Action, the shield is destroyed and won't have any effect. Damage dealt by this Move cannot be healed for 24 hrs

system.description: The user curls up and rolls at full speed to strike the foe. It may leave the target swatted on the ground.
system.effect: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Flinch the foe.

system.description: The Pokemon casts a fierce wind that carries millions of rough sand particles.
system.effect: Sandstorm Weather is activated for the next 4 Rounds.

system.description: The user will capture its foe in a crushing jaw grip. It won't let go no matter how much you try to seperate them. The only way it will release its victim is by fainting.
system.effect: Both User and Target are Blocked.

system.description: The user charges against the foe at full force, not just to knock it down but to restain it with its many limbs.
system.effect: Reduce foe's Strength.

system.description: The user carries the opponent to the sky, then drops the target from that altitude.
system.effect: Charge Move. While charging this move the Target is flinched. Flying Type Pokemon are immune to the Damage of this move. Lifting a target is restricted by the Strength of the User.

system.description: A powerful open palm hit that knocks the foe away and may leave him unable to move.
system.effect: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Paralyze the foe.
Roll your Accuracy as if it was Chance Dice. If Successful, add one die to the Action of an Ally. Up to 6 dice may be added this way.

system.description: The user launches itself up and falls down with a brutal kick. It might hurt the user if it doesn't hit the target.
system.effect: If Accuracy Roll is unsuccessful, deal 5 Dice of Damage to the User. -1 Accuracy.

system.description: The user sneaks close and startles the foe.
system.effect: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Flinch the foe.

system.description: The user surrounds itself with big bolts of electricity, then it crashes against the foe.
system.effect: Recoil. Roll 1 Chance Dice to Paralyze the Foe.

system.description: The Pokemon rubs its electrified cheeks against the foe, it looks very cute but it can be dangerous.
system.effect: Paralyze the foe.

system.description: The Pokemon shoots a giant fireball that explodes on contact with the foe, blasting fire in all directions.
system.effect: Lethal. Roll 3 Chance Dice to apply Burn 3 to the foe. -2 Accuracy.

system.description: The Pokemon uses its flames as propulsion to strike the foe.
system.effect: Increase the User's Dexterity.

system.description: The foe is fully covered with a flammable powder, a source of fire might ignite it with explosive results.
system.effect: Add 3 Dice of Damage to the next Fire Type attack that hits the target.

system.description: The User flails and struggles to survive. The more weakened it is the stronger this attack will be.
system.effect: Add 1 Dice to the Damage Roll for every missing HP the user has. Up to +5 Dice may be added this way.

system.description: Before anyone acts in battle, the user looks at the foe with the cutest eyes.
system.effect: Priority 1. Reduce foe's Strength.

system.description: The user creates a flower crown that heals and relaxes its wearer. Under the right conditions this move also creates a flower patch around its target.
system.effect: Basic Heal. If performed over Grassy Terrain this move is a Complete Heal.

system.description: The Pokemon uses its palm or claws to perform a one-armed chop that shatters even invisible barriers.
system.effect: If a Barrier is in place on the foe's side (ie. Light Screen, Reflect) destroy the barrier and add 2 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool.

system.description: The Pokemon lets go of a big electric charge from its body. The charge comes back to it even bigger.
system.effect: The user restores HP equal to half the damage dealt to one target, rounded down.

system.description: The Pokemon tickles the foe. The laughter really disturbs the foe's fighting stance.
system.effect: Reduce the foe's Strength and Defense.

system.description: The Pokemon meditates to unleash a power that's been sleeping deep inside the user.
system.effect: Increase the User's Strength

system.description: As a fine example of mind over matter, the user temporarily empties its mind to make it more resilient.
system.effect: Increase the User's Sp. Defense by 2.

system.description: The Pokemon releases an explosion of all of its concentrated psychic power in a devastating explosion, afterwards the user will be extremely tired.
system.effect: Lethal. Reduce User's Special by 2. -1 Accuracy.

system.description: The user and the foe start a playful wrestle, it soon escalates into something not so pretty.
system.effect: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Reduce foe's Strength. -1 Accuracy.

system.description: The Pokemon lets out a spiral current that surrounds the foes. They can't move until they free themselves from this terrible whirlwind.
system.effect: Roll 2 Chance Dice to Flinch the foes.

system.description: The user scatters powder around, anyone who comes in contact with it will fall asleep.
system.effect: Put the Target to Sleep. -2 Accuracy.

system.description: The user creates an energy shield to deflect a blow. Some Pokemon may even perform an amazing parry to block the incoming attack.
system.effect: Priority 5. Shield. Reduce 3 Damage this pokemon would receive from a damaging move. Negate effects of Support Moves that target the user. Reduce to zero the set damage from a move the user would take.

system.description: The user blasts the foe with extremely dense water, if the target is tired he may be swept away easily by the pressure.
system.effect: If the foe is at half HP or less, add 3 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool.

system.description: A small electric attack that shocks the foe and may leave it with muscular cramps. Some electric devices hit by this attack will malfunction.
system.effect: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Paralyze the foe.

system.description: A swift punch to the jaw that spins the target and may leave it quite dizzy and disoriented.
system.effect: Roll 2 Chance Dice to Confuse the foe. Fist Based.

system.description: The Pokemon uses its keen smell to detect the foe.
system.effect: The Foe can not Evade moves performed by the User. User's Normal and Fighting Moves can affect Ghost Types and Ghost Moves can affect Normal Types. Add all Successes from this Move to any Rolls to Track the target.

system.description: The Pokemon throws a mega potent hook towards the foe's face.
system.effect: -1 Accuracy.

system.description: The Pokemon uses a ghostly shield to protect itself. If the foe managed to touch it, the user will drain some of its lifeforce.
system.effect: Priority 3. Shield. If the foe was using a Physical Move. Reduce the foe's Strength by 2. Reduce 3 Dice from the foe's Damage Pool.

system.description: This Pokemon uses its gills to snap at its target, even if they don't have teeth, they can have a crushing strength.
system.effect: If the foe has not had its Turn this Round, Add 2 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool.

system.description: This move blocks specific parts of the memory the user is well aware of. Be it moves, techniques, names, places, people, or situations. The target won't be able to recall those memories.
system.effect: The foe cannot use any Moves known by the User. Lasts for a day.

system.description: The user propels itself with a blast of water and strikes at high speed.
system.effect: Priority 1.

system.description: A vicious glare that will make any opponent doubt its own strength in battle.
system.effect: Reduce the Defense of those affected.

system.description: The Pokemon foresses something terrible happening to the target. It may see images from its own future without any risk.
system.effect: Strikes at the end of the next Round. It bypasses any Shield Move and cover. If the target retires or switches out from battle the damage will be dealt to the next opponent or to one of its allies.

system.description: The user roots down and calls the plants to grow in a frenzy around the foe, though it leaves the user exhausted.
system.effect: Must Recharge. -1 Accuracy.

system.description: The Pokemon makes use of all its force to deliver a crushing strike to the foe, this demands a lot from the user.
system.effect: Lethal. Reduce User's Strength and Defense.

system.effect: Roll 2 Chance Dice to Apply Burn 3 to the foe. -2 Accuracy.

system.description: The Pokemon shoots a stream of corrosive sludge made with the most toxic substances it can produce. Just inhaling the scent can make you feel very sick.
system.effect: Ranged. Roll 3 Chance Dice to Poison the Foe. -2 Accuracy.

system.description: Making use of its acting talents, the Pokemon imitates what the target just did.
system.effect: Copies the last move the target used until the end of the scene. That move replaces Mimic.

system.description: The user quickly strikes the foe with a bone, one blow after another.
system.effect: Successive Actions. -1 Accuracy.

system.description: The user calls upon her swarm and heeds them to charge against you. No matter where you run, they will surround you. Hope you are not allergic to bees.
system.effect: High Critical. Ranged.

system.description: The user creates a vortex of fire that remains spinning in the battlefield, trapping the foe within.
system.effect: Blocks. Roll 2 Dice of Damage against the foe at the end of each Round. Lasts 4 Rounds. -2 Accuracy.
This Move's Damage Pool, can be rolled with either the Strength or Special Attribute, dealing Physical or Special Damage respectively. Choose whatever is most convenient for the user.

system.description: The Pokemon lights a heavy stone on fire and kicks it while it's ablaze. The hit is pretty heavy already, the fire is just for showing off.
system.effect: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Apply Burn 2 to the Foe. -1 Accuracy.

system.description: The Pokemon hurls a sphere made of shadow and dark matter to harm the foe.
system.effect: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Reduce foe's Sp. Defense.

system.description: The User lets out its energy in the form of a lightning strike, the happier the user feels the more energized it will be.
system.effect: Add 1 Die to the Damage Roll for every point of Happiness on the User. If the user of this Move is at its Final Stage of Evolution, this move fails.

system.description: The Pokemon takes the target Trick-or-Treating. The target gets a ghost costume which somehow cannot be removed without a medium's help.
system.effect: Add the Ghost type to Target's Type. (ie. Meowth will now by Normal/Ghost Charizard will now be Fire/Flying/Ghost) If the Pokemon already has a third type attached, replace it.

system.description: The Pokemon sheds pieces and starts rotating other parts of its body for easier and lighter movement.
system.effect: Increase the User's Dexterity by 2. User's weight is halved for the rest of Scene.

system.description: The Pokemon shoots pointy pebbles or thorns around the field that deal damage to anyone coming from that side.
system.effect: Foe Pokemon that enter the battlefield will lose 1 HP, this effect does not stack. Pokemon with the Levitate ability and Flying Type Pokemon are immune to this effect. Entry Hazard.

system.description: The user mutters words that become an evil incantation, the curse may only be lifted by a medium or through divine intervention.
system.effect: Roll half the user's HP as damage dice to itself, ignoring Defenses. The target will remove 1 success from all their rolls until the Curse is lifted.

system.description: One Pokemon's trash is another one's treasure.
system.effect: The Pokemon reuses an Item that has already been spent. (Berries etc.) An Item may not be recycled more than 5 times.

system.description: The Pokemon prepares to deal and receive damage by muttering something not appropriate for kids.
system.effect: Increase the User's Strength and Defense. Reduce the User's Dexterity. This effect is only for Pokemon who are not Ghost-Type.

system.description: The user scatters a small cloud of venomous dust that immediately causes coughing and fever.
system.effect: Poison the Foe. -2 Accuracy.

system.description: Through its incredible awareness the Pokemon finds a straight path into a weak point of the foe. The attack that follows is usually devastating.
system.effect: The next time the user lands a hit it will be treated as if it were a Critical Hit.

system.description: The user releases an addictive sweet-smelling steam, do not be fooled as it is toxic and has nasty side-effects.
system.effect: Roll 2 Chance Dice to Confuse the Foe.

system.description: The Pokemon downloads the data of a move that was used against it. Change the code of the user to a type resistant to the that move.
system.effect: After being dealt damage, choose a Type resistant to the Type of that attack. That's the Type of the User until it uses this Move again.

system.description: The user endures the hit then unleashes an attack even greater.
system.effect: The User will take the next 2 hits. After those two attacks, you may use this Move again to retaliate with Strength + Twice the Damage Received from those 2 hits.

system.description: The Pokemon sends a wave of dark feelings that affect those who are most vulnerable, hurting the foe and leaving it unable to act.
system.effect: Targets random foe. Roll 2 Chance Dice to Flinch the foe.

system.effect: If the Target hasn't had a Turn this Round, add 2 Extra Dice to the Damage pool.

system.description: The Pokemon casts an incredible beam that leaves a giant trail of destruction behind. The user is left exhausted.

system.effect: Blocks. Last 1 Round.

system.description: This move absorbs the energy around the user. It may unleash that power in unexpected ways.
system.effect: Inflicts abnormal effects. See Secret Power p.432 for more info.

system.description: The Pokemon uses a mat or something similar as a shield.
system.effect: Shield. Reduce 3 Dice from the foe's Damage Pool. This Move only works the first Round the User has been out.

system.description: The user lets out a horrible belch on the target. The air contains toxins that deal a terrible damage.
system.effect: The user must eat something before using this Move. -1 Accuracy.

system.description: The Pokemon disappears into a dark dimension to infiltrate even the most impenetrable defenses. It may reappear during its next action.

system.effect: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Apply Burn 2 to the foe.

system.effect: Roll 5 Chance Dice to Increase the User's Special. -1 Accuracy.

system.description: The Pokemon rushes towards its target and tramples it without mercy.
The Pokemon shoots a heavy projectile, if the foe is under the effects of the Dynamax phenomenon all the energy will be concentrated and explode on the target.
system.effect: If the Foe is under the effects of Dynamax, This Move becomes Lethal and you add 4 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool.

system.description: The user sucks all gases to clear away all impurities. The target is left heeling hurt, but light headed.
system.effect: Never Fail. Reset all Increased or Reduced Attributes and Traits of the foe.

system.description: The Pokemon strikes with a powerful punch. Through contact, it absorbs some vital energy.
system.effect: Fist Based. The user restore HP equal to half the damage dealt, rounded down.

system.description: Inside the effects of Magic Room, technology, tools, and items manually activated do not work. Automated technology will function as normal.
system.effect: No one can use their Held Item nor any other Item. Lasts 4 Rounds.

system.description: The Pokemon quickly throws sharp jets of water in the shape of a shuriken.
system.effect: Ranged. Priority 1. Successive Actions.

system.description: The Pokemon bends the magnetic field around itself, this also affects all allies who are sensible to it.
system.effect: Increase the Defense and Sp. Defense of User and all its Electric and Steel Type Allies.

system.description: The user rams the foe and absorbs some of its vital energy with its horns.
system.effect: The User restores HP equal to half the damage dealt, rounded down.

system.description: The Pokemon makes a roar that commands respect and authority over anyone listening.
system.effect: Reduce the foe's Strength and Special.

system.description: The Pokemon uses its wings or part of its body to emit sound waves that harm and affect the target.
system.effect: Sound Based. Roll 1 Chance Dice to reduce foe's Sp. Defense.

system.description: A mighty roar that scares the foe.
system.effect: Low Priority 6. In the wild the battle ends. In an official fight, the Pokemon switches out. If its the last or only Pokemon the move fails. Switcher Move.
The most basic attack.

system.description: The Pokemon munches its berry but keeps part of it on its cheeks. Looks adorable but it is actually a survival tactic to survive harsh winters.
system.effect: User eats its held Berry and gains its effects, afterwards, Increase user's Defense by 2.

system.description: The user launches a wave of small but pointy icicles towards the target.
system.effect: Ranged. Successive Actions.

system.description: Foes are drenched in an odd poisonous liquid that targets their weakened immune systems.
system.effect: If an affected foe is poisoned or becomes poisoned in the same Round you used this Move then Reduce its Strength, Special, and Dexterity.

system.description: The Pokemon uses a mysterious power that causes flowers to bloom beneath every Grass Pokemon nearby. Flora in this field is more resilient and beautiful.
system.effect: Increase the Defense of All Grass Type Pokemon on the field.

system.description: No surrender. No retreat. Until victory always.
system.effect: Increase the User's Strength, Dexterity, Special, Defense and Sp. Defense. The user is now blocked.

system.description: The user curls up into a ball and starts rolling towards its foe, trampling everything in its way.

system.effect: It can be used only after the Pokemon has performed all its known moves at least once during the battle.

system.effect: If the Target is Paralyzed, add 2 Extra Dice to the Damage pool of this Move. After dealing damage, cure the target's Paralysis.

system.description: The user starts playing with the foe in a friendly way. This makes the foe reconsider its aggressive demeanor.
system.effect: Reduce the foe's Strength.

system.description: The user submerges into the water and continues diving at an insane speed.

system.description: The user creates an explosive sound that deafens everyone in the battlefield.
system.effect: Sound Based.

system.effect: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Flinch the Foe.

system.description: The user approaches its foe and gives it a lovely present that may be nice or may be a prank.

system.description: The user plays a beautiful and soothing melody that lulls the target into a peaceful sleep.

system.description: The Pokemon attacks using its sharp claws, the friction may leave them even sharper.

system.description: The user performs a curious mystic dance that summons a heavy rainfall.
system.effect: Rain Weather is activated for the next 4 Rounds.

system.description: The Pokemon throws a mega powered kick to the foe's face.
system.effect: -2 Accuracy.

system.description: Either by a menacing attitude or cute demeanor, the foe will be unsure about attacking the user with full force.
system.effect: Reduce the foe's Strength. Sound Based. "Growl (Cute/Tough)", the user should use the one with highest stat (tough / cute)

system.description: The user can manipulate objects and creatures with his mind. Pokemon and humans become easier to hit because their movements are restrained.
system.effect: All attacks against the target have "Never Fail". The target is immune to Ground Moves. Lasts 2 Rounds.

system.description: The Pokemon draws its foe performing a move. It learns how to perform that move in the process.

system.description: The user quickly creates a barrier that reflects any minor attack, status condition, or dirty triick the foe might have wanted to use.

system.description: The Pokemon enrages the foe with its arrogant demeanor, making it lose focus in battle.

system.description: The user prepares to receive damage, then returns the same damage and more.
system.effect: This Move can only deal damage if the Foe has dealt Physical Damage to the User this Round. Roll the same Damage Pool as your Foe plus 2 Extra Dice. Ignore the foe's Defenses.

system.description: The user recklessly slams its foe to deal a lot of damage, but it may also hurt itself in the process.
system.effect: Recoil.

system.description: The user polishes the rough ends of its rock body for easier and faster movement.
system.effect: Increase User's Dexterity by 2.

system.description: The air is so cold it hurts to move, to see, to breath. Escaping should be your top priority, for every second you don't your life will be at peril.
system.effect: Lethal. All Foes in Range. Reduce the Dexterity of those affected.

system.description: The user curls into a snowball, rolling against the foe. The ball grows bigger as it rolls.
system.effect: Successive Actions. Add 1 Extra Dice to the Damage Roll of the last Ice Ball hit the user performes. If the Pokemon used Defense Curl this Round, add 1 Extra Dice to the Damage Roll of every hit. -1 Accuracy.

system.description: The user shoots three beams. Each one is charged with a different kind of energy.
system.effect: Roll 2 Chance Dice to Paralyze the foe. Roll 2 Chance Dice to Burn the foe. Roll 2 Chance Dice to Freeze the Foe.

system.description: The Pokemon creates a slide of falling rocks against its foes that may leave them crushed below the rubble.
system.effect: Ranged. Roll 3 Chance Dice to Flinch those affected. -1 Accuracy.

system.description: The user starts pushing its pressure points, releasing the energy that was stored in its body.
system.effect: Increase a Random Attribute. If this Move is used again, the previous Attribute Modifier is removed.

system.description: The user stores part of its power on a twig or a stick, anyone who touch the item will receive its might.
system.effect: Switcher Move. User switches out with another Pokemon. Any Attribute increase on the user is passed on the next Pokemon. The user can’t increase its Attributes again until the end of the scene.

system.description: The user analyzes the advantages of the foe then makes them their own.
system.effect: Erase any Increase or Decrease on the foe's Traits, and place them on the User instead.

system.description: The user's telekinetic force is enough to cause severe harm to their target. This telekinesis is not subtle.
system.effect: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Reduce the foe's Sp. Defense.

system.description: The user breathes fire from its mouth while biting the target.
system.effect: Roll 2 Chance to Flinch the Foe. Roll 2 Chance Dice to Burn the foe. -1 Accuracy.

system.description: The user boils a freshly layed egg and restores Health with the energy stored within.
system.effect: Basic Heal. If successful spend 1 Will point to activate.

system.description: This Powerful tail strike can knockdown anyone up to 100 feet away!
system.effect: Low Priority 1. The target is hit and knocked back to its trainer, stunned. Forcing the trainer to send another Pokemon. In the wild the target is sent away. Switcher Move. -1 Accuracy.

system.description: The Pokemon becomes a giant energy shield that tramples everything in its wake. If the foe is under the effects of the Dynamax phenomenon all its energy will be swept away.
system.effect: If the Foe is under the effects of Dynamax, This Move becomes Lethal and you add 4 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool.

system.description: A mighty arm thrust that leaves the user quite tired.
system.effect: After dealing damage, Reduce user's Dexterity. -1 Accuracy.

system.description: The tail of this Pokemon is sharp like a blade, it attacks with slashing movements and may release some poison through it.
system.effect: High Critical. Roll 1 Chance Dice to Poison the Foe.

system.description: After falling asleep, the Pokemon is still dreaming about the fight.
system.effect: While this Pokemon is asleep, it may use one of its Moves at random.

system.description: The user strikes with an intense and alluring kick.
system.effect: Reduce Foe's Strength.

system.description: The user slams the foe usin its whole body weight. Smaller foes will be deeply affected.
system.effect: Add 1 Extra Dice for every 50 kgs. of weight above the target's weight, up to +4 Extra Dice.

system.description: With a charming and manipulative cry, the user deals emotional damage to its opponent. This move always makes the target feel bad.
system.effect: Sound Based. Never Fail. Targets All foes in range.

system.description: The Pokemon shoots a beautiful rainbow colored beam that may leave the foe flabbergasted.
system.effect: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Reduce foe's Strength.

system.description: The Pokemon uses its action to land on the ground and relax.
system.effect: Basic Heal. Until the User's next action this Pokemon will be vulnerable to Ground Type moves.

system.description: The Pokemon gathers the sand around itself to restore its body to shape.
system.effect: Basic Heal. If performed under Sandstorm weather, this move is a Complete Heal.
The foe is Blocked. Foe can resist this Maneuver by rolling their Strength or Dexterity score and scoring the same or more successes than the user.

system.description: The user encloses itself inside its sturdy shell, which is covered by poisonous barbs. If a barb pinches the foe's skin the wound will start to fester.
system.effect: Priority 4. Shield. If the foe attacked using a Physical Move, it is now Poisoned. Reduce 3 Dice from the Foe's Damage Pool.

system.description: The Pokemon fights ruthlessly and may retaliate fiercely against a foe that has hurt the user.
system.effect: If the User has already received damage this round, add 2 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool.

system.description: The Pokemon releases an irritating powder that annoys and enrages foes into attacking.
system.effect: Priority 2. During this Round, all damage moves from any foe must target the User.

system.description: A decent hit to smash the foes.
A strong current of wind that blows away any fog and even invisible barriers.
system.effect: Remove all Barriers (ie. Light Screen, Reflect), Entry Hazards (Toxic Spikes, Stealth Rock, etc.), and Terrains (Misty Terrain, Electric Terrain, etc.) from the battlefield.

system.description: The User can ignite its fists for a brief moment without any danger of getting burned. The foe may not be so lucky.
system.effect: Fist Based. Roll 1 Chance Dice to apply Burn 2 to the foe.

system.description: The user focuses the sunlight it has absorbed into a powerful and devastating beam of light.
system.effect: Charge Move. If there is a Sunny Weather, you skip this Move's Charge action. If performed under Rain, Sandstorm, or Hail Weather, this Move takes two actions to Charge.

system.description: The user learns to shoot water with enough force to hurt the foe.
In less than a second, the sound of steam boiling over a raging engine thunders through the ears of the foe before it is shot through the sky by a scalding geyser.
system.effect: Lethal. Roll 3 Chance Dice to Apply Burn 2 to those affected. -1 Accuracy.

system.description: The user mimics the target and takes on the most basic features from that character.

system.description: The user threatens the foe, leaving it too scared to pursuit the user or overwhelm the ally that just switched in the battlefield.
system.effect: Reduce foe's Strength and Special. The user switches out, the new Pokemon arrives ready to fight. Roll for its initiative. Switcher Move.

system.description: The user surrounds the battlefield with a mystical mist that feels protective. Mythical Pokemon find something eerie about it.
system.effect: Creatures standing on the battlefield won't be affected by Status Ailments. Dragon Type attacks won't add their Power to the Damage Pool. Lasts 4 Rounds.

system.description: Every Pokemon has an unknown power that can be released with surprising results.

system.description: The Pokemon creates a small electricity orb that is hurled at the target. If the user is faster, the impact will be bigger.

system.description: The user builds up pressure inside its body and then releases a tremendous amount of water at the target.
system.effect: -1 Accuracy.

system.description: The user relaxes and lightens its body to move faster.
system.effect: Increase the User's Dexterity by 2.

system.description: The Pokemon flies straight at the foe at full speed, the collision might hurt both of them.
system.effect: Recoil.

system.description: The user's sight transcends the flesh and can look directly into the innermost mental pressence of everyone around. Hidden enemies can be detected.
system.effect: The User may hit Dark Type Pokemon with Psychic Moves. The Pokemon ignores Evasion modifiers. Opponents can't reduce the User's Accuracy.

system.description: The Pokemon makes use of its ability to blow up parts of its own body in an impressive display of power.
system.effect: After performing the move, the user receives damage equal to its remaining HP.

system.description: By drawing energy from the Eternal Flower, the Pokemon unleashes all of its hurt. A beautiful light surrounds the area, yet the pain inside of its heart remains.
system.effect: Lethal. Recoil. -1 Accuracy.

system.description: Zekrom delivers a powerful tackle while discharging lightning through its body. The foe is rendered unable to move, either by the strike or the electricity
system.effect: Roll 2 Chance Dice to Paralyze the foe. -2 Accuracy.

system.description: The user looks for an opening and strikes directly there. It nibbles bit by bit even the toughest of surfaces.
system.effect: This attack ignores Defense and Evasion modifiers on the foe.

system.description: The user gathers power from the light of the moon, the energy absorbed can heal most injuries.

system.description: The user claps and cheers at the target to encourage it to repeat what it just did.

system.description: The foe is covered with a disgusting sludge, the fumes and toxins on it can make anyone feel sick.

system.description: The Pokemon violently lashes the foe with its vines or a part of its body, acting as a powerful whip.
system.effect: -2 Accuracy.

system.description: The Pokemon makes a wish with all its might and somehow it becomes true.

system.description: The Pokemon rudely starts poking its foe with a stick.

system.effect: Increase the User's Defense by 2.

system.description: The user curls like a ball to protect against most threats.

system.effect: Add up to 7 Dice to the Damage Pool for every Increased Attribute the foe has. (ie. Foe has 1 Increased dice in Dexterity & Strength that equals +2 Dice on the Damage Pool of this attack).

The Pokemon chases the foe to deliver a final blow before it escapes.

system.description: The user slams the foe with its tail, vines, etc. to deal a decent amount of damage.
system.effect: -2 Accuracy.

system.description: The user mocks and teases the target to make it attack in a raging fury.

system.description: The user lands a vicious bite that may leave an ugly bruise.
system.effect: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Flinch the foe.

system.description: The user points a focused light onto one of its allies as if it were on a stage, the ally can't help but catch everyone's attention into itself.
system.effect: Priority 3. Foes will target One Ally this turn.

system.description: The Pokemon recklessly slams the foe with a part of its rugged body, the user also gets hurt in the process.
system.effect: Recoil.

system.description: The user cloaks itself in flames and rolls to tackle the target.
system.effect: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Burn the foe.

system.description: The user bites the foe and releases a gelid breath through its mouth.
system.effect: Roll 2 Chance Dice to Flinch the foe. Roll 2 Chance Dice to Freeze the foe. -1 Accuracy.

system.description: Releases the inner power of the mind to emanate psychic waves that hurt the target.
system.effect: Roll Damage Dice according to the User's Rank. 1 Dice at Starter Rank. 2 Dice at Beginner Rank. 3 dice at Amateur Rank. 4 Dice at Ace Rank. 5 Dice at Professional Rank. Ignores Defense.

system.description: The user concentrates and releases a blast of energy.
system.effect: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Reduce foe's Sp. Defense. -2 Accuracy.

system.description: The user attacks a vital spot and sucks away the vitality of its foe.
system.effect: The user restores HP equal to half the damage dealt rounded down.

system.description: The user curls up in a ball and spins against the target at a high speed.
system.effect: Add 1 Extra Dice to the Damage pool for every point of Dexterity the Foe has that surpasses the user's. Up to 5 Dice may be added this way.

system.description: The user forms a pitch black wave that hurts the foe. This darkness may remain obstructing the target's vision.
system.effect: Roll 4 Chance Dice to Reduce foe's Accuracy.

system.description: The user and the target swap their feelings of powerr and weakness, insecurity and courage, love and hate. Boosts are also swapped.
system.effect: Switch any Trait Increase/Decrease with the target.

system.description: The user throws its berry at the foe. The results can be quite surprising.
system.effect: User loses its held berry. Ranged. See Natural Gift on p.432 for more info.

system.description: The user is so flat that you can barely see it in the tall grass, it is just waiting for its foe to get close enough to use its body as a snare trap.
system.effect: Target is Blocked for the Next 4 Rounds.

system.description: The user stiffins its body and prepares for any incoming attack.
system.effect: Increase the User's Defense.

system.description: The user throws a mighty kick engulfed in fire that may leave a bad looking burn.
system.effect: High Critical. Roll 2 Chance Dice to Apply Burn 2 to the Foe. -1 Accuracy.

system.description: The user radiates electricity around itself, the foe will think twice about attacking.
system.effect: Reduce foe's Special by 2.

system.description: The user strikes its foe, then quickly goes back to safety while another party Pokemon takes its place.
system.effect: The user switches out after dealing damage. The replacement Pokemon arrives to ready to fight. Roll its initiative Switcher Move.

system.description: The user employs its psychic power to average its resilience with the foe. They both feel like they're equals in terms of toughness.
system.effect: Average your Defense and Sp. Defense with your target.

system.description: The Pokemon makes a dramatic entrance to the battlefield, taking the foe by surprise as to who its opponent really is.
system.effect: Priority 2. This move will only work the First Round the Pokemon is out in battle. From the second round on it will fail automatically.

system.description: The user throws a big seed that explodes on contact with the foe.
system.effect: Ranged.

system.description: The user charges at a blinding speed against the target.
system.effect: Priority 2. Triple the Pokemon's movement speed.

system.description: The user touches its foe while playing "Freeze!". Surprisingly, the foe becomes frozen on a block of ice. Once they realize they were just playing pretend the ice dissolves into haze.
system.effect: If successful, remove all Increased or Reduced Attributes and Traits the Foe may have. If the user of this Move is at its Final Stage of Evolution, this move fails. -1 Accuracy.

system.description: The Pokemon summons a storm of diamonds over the field, these diamonds also serve as barriers the user can take cover into.
system.effect: Ranged. Roll 5 Chance Dice to Increase the User's Defense by 2.

system.description: The Pokemon uses the sharpest part of its body to almost snap the neck of its foe. It is a devastating attack. The foe must be lucky to get out of it alive.
system.effect: The target is dealt damage equal to its remaining HP plus 1 Lethal. -5 Accuracy.

system.description: The more exhausted the user is, the stronger this attack will become. When the Pokemon is at the last of its strength this move can be devastating.
system.effect: If User's Will is half spent add 1 Dice to the Damage Roll. If the User's Will is depleted add +8 to the Damage Pool.

system.description: The user concentrates and manages to imitate the last move used by the foe.
system.effect: Copies the last Damaging Move the foe has performed.

system.description: The Pokemon quickly covers the arena with a sticky web, newly arrived foes will have trouble moving with ease.
system.effect: Entry Hazard. Foe Pokemon that enter the battlefield get a Dexterity Reduction of 1. Pokemon with the Levitate ability and Flying Type Pokemon are immune to this effect.

system.description: The Pokemon respectfully offers an item, the target will take it and keep it to be polite.
system.effect: If target is not holding an Item, the User gives its own.

system.description: The user amplifies all electrically charged particles in the environment. The results are shocking!
system.effect: For the rest of the Scene, Normal Type Moves will deal damage as if they were Electric Type Moves.

system.description: The user hurls a ball of toxic sludge that explodes on contact and covers the target.
system.effect: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Poison the Foe.

system.description: A basic psychic power to exert force on objects. You can touch, move, press, and affect simple objects to create distractions.
system.effect: Lower the foe's Accuracy.

system.description: The Pokemon has had a terrible day and has a very bad headache, try not to disturb its peace because its head feels like exploding.
system.effect: Area Attack. Recoil.

system.description: The Pokemon uses its sharp feathers as if they were razors.
system.effect: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Increase the User's Defense. -1 Accuracy.

system.description: The Pokemon's energy is raised to make all strikes much more precise.
system.effect: All of the user's damage moves now have High Critical. This effect lasts until end of scene or the user is removed from battle.

system.description: The Pokemon shows its muscles with intimidating poses to look bigger and stronger.
system.effect: Increase the User's Strength and Defense.

system.description: The Pokemon traps the foe with its pincers or jaws and applies pressure that will leave a nasty bruise.
The user charges its fists with electricity, and upon impact the charge materializes into plasma that adds an electric element to all of its Normal moves.
system.effect: Fist Based. If successful, all Normal-Type Moves of the user will be considered Electric Type until the end of the Scene.

system.description: The Pokemon sets ablaze a swirling pillar upon the target, said pillar will grow taller and swirl faster if there's a special kind of charge nearby.
system.effect: Lethal. If the Move “Fusion Bolt” has already been used by anyone this Round, add 4 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool of this Move

system.description: A brutal punch that requires calm and concentration
system.effect: Fist Based. Charge Move. The User will flinch if it gets hit before releasing this attack.

system.description: The Pokemon compacts its body, appearing smaller than its normal size.
system.effect: The User can now make up to 5 Evasions per Round.

system.description: The user shoots a small flame against the target that may cause a first-degree burn.
system.effect: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Burn the foe.

system.description: The user freezes all moisture in the environment, water type Pokemon suffer greatly.
system.effect: Water type Pokemon are dealt 2 Extra Damage.

system.description: The Pokemon gathers everyone for a cup of delicious tea. Not eating a snack along with it would be a waste.
system.effect: Those affected eat their held berries without gaining their effects. Outside of battle will diffuse violent intentions for a few minutes

system.description: The Pokemon looks for a weak spot on its foe, then feeds on its vital energy. The foe is left feeling feeble.
system.effect: Reduce Foe's Strength. User Heals HP equal to the Foe's Current Strength Score. Healing in-battle limitations apply.

system.description: The user rotates its body imitating a drill and crashes against the foe. This attack may pierce through walls and floors with ease and great precision.
system.effect: High Critical.

system.description: The Pokemon calls upon the healing power of nature to grow a patch of miraculous grass on its side of the battlefield.
system.effect: If successful, spend 1 Will point to activate. Everyone in the user's side of the field heals 1 HP at the end of each round. Add 1 Extra Dice to the Damage Rolls of Grass Type Moves.

system.description: The Pokemon dashes at great speed using the rocks on its body to strike its foe upon impact.
system.effect: Priority 1.

system.description: The user hurls a dreadful bombardment of electric explosions. Anyone hit won't be able to move for a very long time.
system.effect: Lethal. Paralyze the Foe. -3 Accuracy.

system.description: The user drops a big icicle over the foe, the impact may leave the opponent dazed.
system.effect: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Flinch the Foe. -1 Accuracy.

system.description: The Pokemon attacks with a pulsing blast of water, this leaves the foe feeling dizzy.
system.effect: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Confuse the foe.

system.description: In the heat of the battle, the Pokemon gets carried away, relishing in its own power.
system.effect: Add 1 Dice to the Damage Pool of this Move for every Attribute increase the user has. Up to 7 Dice may be added this way. (ie. the user has 2 increased points on Defense, add 2 Damage dice).

system.description: The user sends out a floating leaf that will pursue the target until it hits.
system.effect: Never Fail.

system.description: The user lays a trap of scattered poison spikes that attach to the opponent's feet leaving them with a bad case of fever.
system.effect: Foe Pokemon that enter the battlefield become Poisoned. Roll 1 Chance Dice for the Poison to become Badly Poisoned instead. Entry Hazard.

system.description: The user torments and enrages the foe, making it unable to keep using its strategy.
system.effect: The target cannot use the same Moves it used during the last Round. Lasts 4 Rounds.

system.description: The user plants some seeds on the target, the seeds sprout and restore the user's health by absorbing the foe's vital energy.
system.effect: If successful spend 1 Will point to activate. At the end of each Round, Roll 1 Dice of Damage to the foe. User heals for 1 HP for every damage dealt this way. Grass Type Pokemon are immune to this Move. -1 Accuracy.

system.description: The Pokemon uses its own body as an amplifier for the energizing sounds it produces.
system.effect: All Foes in Range. Sound Based.

system.description: A basic attack that consists of charging at an enemy.
The Pokemon bites the foe and injects its poison directly through its fangs. After that it just waits for the poison to slowly take care of its foe.
system.effect: Roll 5 Chance Dice to Badly Poison the Foe.

system.description: The user stomps and tramples the place, breaking stones, trees, and everything nearby.
system.effect: Reduce the Dexterity of those affected.

system.description: The Pokemon's eyes zoom at a moving target to ensure that the next attack will be dealt with precision.
system.effect: The next attack the user performs has 2 automatic unremovable successes on its Accuracy Roll.

system.description: The Pokemon extracts a great amount of vital energy from the foe's body.
system.effect: The user restores HP equal to half the damage dealt, rounded down.

system.description: The Pokemon creates a shifting sand pit around the foe, leaving it unable to escape.
system.effect: Ranged. Block. Roll 2 Dice of Damage against the foe at the end of every Round. Lasts 4 Rounds. -2 Accuracy.

system.description: The Pokemon commands a tremendous lightning to strike a specific point on the ground. It's quite dangerous.
system.effect: Lethal. Roll 3 Chance Dice to Paralyze foe. If performed under Sunny Weather, Accuracy becomes -3 instead. If performed under Rain Weather, Ignore this Moves Reduced Accuracy. -2 Accuracy.

system.description: With a whip of fire, the Pokemon ensnares its foe, who is left defenseless and at its mercy.
system.effect: Reduce Foe's Defense.

system.description: While the foe is preparing its attack, the user takes advantage and strikes.
system.effect: Priority 1. This move can only be used after the Target rolls a damaging move.

system.description: A furious storm of sharp leaves swirls and pierces the target. The user is left exhausted.
system.effect: Reduce the User's Special by 2. -1 Accuracy.

system.description: A slim but precise cut that may slice through anything.
system.effect: May be used to cut down trees and clear paths.

system.description: The user calls a floating ember to consume the foe.
system.effect: Burn the Foe. -2 Accuracy.

system.description: The user disrupts the fighting stance of its foe by sending a sharp sound to the foe's ears.
system.effect: Reduce the foe's Defense by 2. Sound Based.

system.description: The user sends out a wind current full of snowflakes that freeze whatever they touch. This powder can easily turn a room to ice.
system.effect: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Freeze those affected.

system.description: Out of nowhere, pointy shards come raining from the sky towards the foes, even flying creatures will fall to the ground if they are knocked by them. Take cover, this is gonna hurt.
system.effect: Lethal. Ranged. All Foes in Range. If successful, Flying and Levitating Pokemon can be hit by Ground-Type Moves for the rest of the scene.

system.description: The Pokemon uses its intimidating glare to paralyze the foe with sheer terror.
system.effect: Paralyze the foe. -1 Accuracy.

system.description: The user throws a big egg with great force against its foe.
system.effect: Ranged. -2 Accuracy.

system.description: The user leaves an imprinting grudge over the foe, this makes the target unwilling to fight. It may only keep battling if something greater is at risk.
system.effect: The User Faints. The foe gets its Will depleted and any effects gained from spending them. The Foe must roll Loyalty at the end of every Round to keep battling. Each Round 1 more success is required.

system.description: The target gets launched up then falls face first into the ground, the stronger the user the higher the foe will be thrown.
system.effect: Roll Damage Dice according to the User's Rank. 1 Dice at Starter Rank. 2 Dice at Beginner Rank.  3 dice at Amateur Rank.  4 Dice at Ace Rank.  5 Dice at Professional Rank. Ignores Defense.

system.description: The Pokemon rattles the scales of its armor creating a frightening noise in the area. Some of its scales fall of as a result, leaving some areas exposed.
system.effect: Sound Based. Reduce User's Defense.

system.description: The user appears to become a block of ice, then it releases itself from the ice with a devastating discharge. The exploding ice shards and the lightning fly all over the battlefield.
system.effect: Lethal. Ranged. Charge Move. Roll 3 Chance Dice to Paralyze the Foe. -1 Accuracy.

system.description: The user throws two powerful kicks.
system.effect: Double Action.

system.description: The Pokemon uses its body to hold and constrict the foe. It won't let go easily.
system.effect: Blocks. Roll 2 Dice of Damage against the foe at the end of each Round. Lasts 4 Rounds.

system.description: Using some frosting the Pokemon decorates their target to look bigger, more powerful, and incredibly delicious!
system.effect: Increase the Strength and Special of One Ally by 2

system.description: The user feint attacks then tricks the foe who ends up hurting itself.
system.effect: S.T.A.B of the user and Strength of the foe apply for this move's damage.

system.description: The Pokemon shakes its scales around, to sharpen, shed, and rearrange them. It's a bit rough, but in the end the Pokemon feels more focused for battle.
system.effect: User deals Damage to itself equal to Half of its total HP rounded down. Increase User's Strength, Dexterity, Special, Defense and Sp. Defense.

system.description: The Pokemon summons a huge swarm of bugs to prevent the foe from escaping. Sometimes the swarm may take a hit to the foe. The call extends for hundreds of yards.
system.effect: Blocks. Roll 2 Dice of Damage against the foe at the end of each Round. Lasts 4 Rounds.

system.description: The user creates a ball of energy that will use the climate around it to grow in size and power.
system.effect: If the battlefield is under a Weather, add +2 to the Damage Roll and change the Type of the Move accordingly: Sun-Fire. Rain-Water. Hail-Ice. Sandstorm-Rock. Wind-Flying.

system.description: The user represses the foe with intimidation so it has to think twice before acting.
system.effect: For the rest of the scene, the target will go last in the order of Initiative.

system.description: A concentrated flameball that bursts on contact with the foe, scattering smaller flames around.
system.effect: After dealing damage, the user may roll 1 Dice of Damage against two other Targets.

system.description: A powerful somniferous spore that is shot at the target to make it fall asleep.
system.effect: Put the Target to Sleep.

system.description: The user moves rapidly around the foe, creating illusory copies of itself.
system.effect: The User can now make up to 5 Evasions per Round.

system.description: The Pokemon will draw everyone's attention. All foes are taunted to do their worst.
system.effect: Foes will target the user this Round. Priority 5.

system.description: A powerful hit that can crush rocks. Used against a foe it is sure to leave an awful bruise and a crack on its armor.
system.effect: Roll 5 Chance Dice to Reduce foe's Defense.

system.description: The user bows and courteously lets an ally or foe use their action first.
system.effect: The Target will go first in the order of Initiative. Lasts for the rest of this Battle.

system.description: The Pokemon opens portals to attack with each one of its arms, bypassing all defenses and making it impossible to escape, however, the user's defense also gets neglected.
system.effect: Never Fail. Ignores the effect of any Shield Move the Foe might have used. Reduce the user's Defense.

system.description: The user spins in the air landing an impressive kick that may daze the target.
system.effect: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Flinch the Foe. -2 Accuracy.

system.description: The Pokemon downloads the data of a Move to add it to its code.
system.effect: The user changes its type at random.

system.description: The Pokemon is covered by a gelatinous goo that can be used to treat several ailments, the Pokemon also uses it as a source of nourishment.
system.effect: Heal a Target's Status Ailment. If you do then the user may heal 1 HP.

system.description: The Pokemon shoots a wave of pointy projectiles at the foe.
system.effect: Ranged. Successive Actions.

system.description: The user manifests its mental power on the world, creating invisible walls and floors that prevent the passing of objects.
system.effect: User and Allies will receive 1 less Damage from Physical Attacks. Lasts 4 Rounds.

system.description: The Pokemon sings a beautiful melody, the song comes out as a sparkling fountain, bursting upon impact and quenching any fire in its path.
system.effect: Sound Based. Area Attack. If an affected Pokemon had any of the Burn Status Conditions, heal it instead of dealing damage.

system.description: The Pokemon jumps and delivers a powerful kick. It might hurt the user if it doesn't hit the target.
system.effect: If Accuracy Roll is unsuccessful, deal 4 Dice of Damage to the User.

system.description: The Pokemon uses all of its power to deliver an infernal blast to the foe. The user is left exhausted.
system.effect: Lethal. Must Recharge. -1 Accuracy.

system.description: The user enters the target's dream to torment it.
system.effect: Will only work if the Target is asleep. Deal 1 Damage to the foe. Deal 1 Damage again at the beginning of each Round if the target is still asleep.

system.description: The user gathers its mettle to block away the pain and focus on hitting harder.
system.effect: Add 1 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool for every missing HP the User has. Up to 5 Dice may be added this Way.

system.description: A tide of bright lightning streams from the floor onto the foe. The target's body will be cramped for hours.
system.effect: Paralyze the foe. -1 Accuracy.

system.description: Through a terrifying roar, Dialga bounds the forces of time on a single area, the unfortunate target will be trapped in a time warp, growing old in a matter of seconds.
system.effect: Lethal. If successful, the target can't have any action until next Round. -1 Accuracy.

system.description: The Pokemon will jump 30 feet in the air before landing on top of the foe. The user won't suffer any falling damage.
system.effect: Charge Move. While charging this Move, the user will be out of range. Roll 3 Chance Dice to Paralyze the foe.

system.description: The user attacks with an odd, almost invisible power.
system.effect: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Flinch the foe.
